price: Ambao wanapo jipimia kwa watu hudai watimiziwe.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ
footnotes: Ambao wakijipimia wenyewe kwa watu hujitwalia ya kutosha na kuzidi,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhīna idhā ik'tālū ʿalā al-nāsi yastawfūna
